title: Resolution: Heartland Revenge Series Book 3
description: In the third installment of the Heartland Revenge series, fugitive Joe Demming returns to rural Indiana to collect hidden cash and pay back the people he holds responsible for the death of his brother and the demise of his criminal empire. He’ll use a local waitress to get within striking distance.Tammy Marks must reveal her secret past to Trooper Wes Bradley or lose the only man she’s ever loved. Coming clean could mean either a happy life she’s never dared dream or life in prison. Will she risk everything for love?Danny Johnson suspects a stranger in town could be trouble, but he has other He’s a vigilante killer about to become sheriff. He’s getting married to a woman who doesn’t know he sent her husband to his death, and his soon-to-be-sisters-in-law are former hookers living in his house.More than leaves will change as autumn comes to Claymont. For some, much will be resolved. For others, things are just warming up.
author: Cheryl Reed
